temples.name: Bogotá Colombia Temple
temples.info: Bogota Temple is a beautiful temple ubicated in the center of the city. It has beautiful gardens and is near malls. We are located within the temple grounds.

temples.name: Caracas Venezuela Temple
temples.address1: Avenida. C con Calle C-1, Urb Caurimare
temples.info: Caracas temple is a small but beautiful temple located in the capital of Venezuela. We are located near the temple and are waiting to offer you all our services in this beautiful location.
